name: Bodhisattva Ksitigarbha (Sa Yi Nyingpo)
shortLoreBlurb: Bodhisattva Ksitigarbha (Sa Yi Nyingpo) is a deity from Tibet linked to underworld, vows. Mediates with the dead and fate.
description: Bodhisattva Ksitigarbha (Sa Yi Nyingpo) is a deity from Tibet linked to underworld, vows. Mediates with the dead and fate.
